Texts.Eng:
Half-bunny, Half-wolf, all cuteness. They make their homes in colder climates and tend to curl up with their floofy tails to sleep for extra warmth. They have been linked to eldritch entities which may explain their higher resistance to radiation.

 Diet: Omnivorous
  
 ^orange;Perks^reset;:
 +^green;20%^reset; Max Energy.
 +^green;6%^reset; speed, ^green;20%^reset; jump boost, and +^green;50%^reset; fall resist, Resist: ^green;20%^reset; Cold, ^green;20%^reset; Cosmic, ^green;10%^reset; Radioactive,
 ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Snow, Slush, Ice
  
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 Gain additional vitality and protection in ^green; Alien, & Snow^reset; biomes
 Lose some vitality and protection in ^red; Volcanic, Magma, Sulphuric, and their Dark counterparts, and Desert^reset; biomes
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 Machine Pistol: ^green;20%^reset; Mastery
 Assault Rifle: ^green;20%^reset; Mastery
 Magnorb: ^green;+20%^reset; Mastery, +Protection
    
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
 ^red;-15%^reset; Max Health
 ^red;6%^reset; faster Hunger Buildup
 Weak: ^red;20%^reset; Fire, ^red;20%^reset; Poison, ^red;20%^reset; Electric
